name: Indiga 100mg capsule
description: Gabapentin capsules, tablets, and oral solutions are used along with other medicines to help control certain types of seizures in people who have epilepsy. Gabapentin capsules, tablets, and oral solutions are also used to relieve the pain of neuralgia. Gabapentin extended-release tablets (Horizant) are used to treat restless legs syndrome.
label: medicine
